main event: On April 6, 1967, an Air Force officer and his family observed a bright, elongated object moving rapidly in the sky over Mesa, Arizona.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 15 seconds.,Two citizens, Mr. John Doe and Mrs. Jane Doe, reported seeing a silver, disc-shaped object hovering 50 feet above the ground for about 10 minutes.,Miss Betty Jane Doe reported seeing a bright light moving in a zig-zag pattern for 2-3 minutes.,The investigation classified the incidents as 'Unidentified' pending further analysis.,No radar trackings or physical evidence of the objects were recovered.
sighted object: a bright, elongated object and a silver disc-shaped object
witness description: An Air Force officer, his family, and two other citizens (John and Jane Doe), and Miss Betty Jane Doe
